\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 67619}

\subsection*{Super Concussion Time}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{Gaston}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 &   & inhaled & Inhalants & gas\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 250.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
 \#\#EROWID\_NOTE:SOLVENT\_INHALANT\_RISKS\#\# 



I was inhaling nitrous (sic) from a dust remover can while my friend played Guitar Hero. He was really engrossed in the game, and I kept holding the nitrous (sic) in longer and longer. Finally I dissociated so bad that I went blind, forgot how to breathe, and passed out.



When I came to I had a mild concussion and a bump on the back of my head the size of a grapefruit. I had to go to the hospital, couldn't sleep for days\ldots  Please learn from this story and be careful when you do shit like this, alright? Especially don't stand up on a concrete floor.

\end{document}
